name: Detective Palette
description:
A platformer that uses colours for combat, puzzle-solving, and navigation. 

This is a quick demo to explore the main mechanics to this game. Please, if you play this demo, answer the survey to help me tune this prototype. There's a link to it in game, but here it is again: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScS45KMwlVvHe8-_rj0U5baF6qkDoSny5ynKNttBrb9dii3Vw/viewform

Thank you a lot!
